results.title: Surfmovies
results.creator_credit: Albie Thoms Productions and Albie Thoms
results.brief_description: Using clips from newsreels and surf movies, notably “Crystal Voyager”, made in Australia over the last fifty years, and interviewing filmmakers and others involved in the multi-million dollar Australian surfing industry, this documentary shows the close relationship between surf movies and the sport that usually see Australians as the world champions. Contains some b&w footage.

results.title: Surfing waves
results.creator_credit: John Davis and Australian Broadcasting Commission
results.brief_description: Demonstrates the action and properties of waves. Aerial views of the seacoast are used to show diffraction and refraction of parallel wave fronts and laboratory examples further exemplify this point. The action of convergent and divergent lens systems is also demonstrated. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Surface tension
results.brief_description: Reviews the nature and shows some applications of surface tension: comparison of solids, gases and liquids with reference to size and shape; demonstration of how the surface of water behaves like an elastic skin; effect of modifying the surface by addition of camphor, ether and soap; surface tension seen in films and bubbles; capillary action; applications including blotting paper, lamp wick, candle, paint brush and killing of mosquito larvae.

results.title: Surface chemistry
results.creator_credit: Edmund Lawrence Dorfman, Brandon Films, Nobel Films and John Gilmour
results.brief_description: Dr Irving Langmuir, Nobel prize winner, describes some of the experiments in surface chemistry which shed light on the properties of the molecule.

results.title: Surf beach [Italian Version]
results.creator_credit: John Martin-Jones, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Bern Gandy
results.brief_description: The hundreds of thousands of Australian who visit the beach each summer seldom realise that ceaseless work is required to keep the beach clean and safe. This film shows the activities of those who work to protect swimmers and guarantee their enjoyment of the beach. NB: In Italian with no English subtitles.

results.title: Surf beach [Greek version]
results.creator_credit: John Martin-Jones, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Bern Gandy
results.brief_description: The hundreds of thousands of Australians whovisit the beach each summer seldom realise that ceaseless work is required to keep the beach clean andsafe. This film shows the activities of those on Bondi beach who work to protect swimmers and guarantee their enjoyment of the beach. NB: In Greek language with no English subtitles.

results.title: Supreme self-confidence
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Paul McKenna’s easy way to health & fitness”.
Hypnotist Paul McKenna presents a program designed to improve self-confidence by making hypnotic and subliminal suggestions aimed at the unconscious.

results.title: Supporting behavior (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Patricia Heffernan-Cabrera, Phil Content and Science Research Associates
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Interaction in the Multicultural Classroom”
We all need others to add their strength to our own. In the classroom pupils need support and guidance from teachers to give them the power to cope. A good teacher manages the classroom so that everyone gets a chance to express himself and grow.

results.title: Supply and drainage ditches
results.creator_credit: CSIRO. Film Unit and J.J. Walker
results.brief_description: Stresses the need for control of irrigation water by the design and construction of ditches capable of handling an adequate flow of water. Describes the design, lay-out and construction of an efficient irrigation system without which fertile land may be ruined by water logging and salting.
